segments.text: Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , may I ask something about the salary and benefits in your company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: According to our regulations , you will be on probation for the first three months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is the salary while on probation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In this period , you can only get the basic salary , 2,500 yuan per month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The salary will be deposited into the bank on the 15th every month . Your salary will be raised every year in October , depending on your performance evaluation.you can get a bonus once a year.and it's normally in December .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you may enjoy a seven-day paid holiday in the first year . After that , you can have two more days each year .
segments.speaker: S1
